document_data.name: Baernoth
document_data.mainbody: '''Baernoth''' was a [[turnip]] farmer and the Elder of the village of [[Maskyr's Eye]] in [[the Vast]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/57/The Everwinking Eye: At Home in Maskyr's Eye|21}}
document_data.Description: Baernoth was a very strong man with a gigantic build and a beard.
document_data.Personality: Despite his build, he was softly spoken, as well as careful and reasonable, yet he seemed to fear nothing in the whole world.
document_data.Activities: By around [[1357 DR]], Baernoth had been elected Elder of the village's governing Council. Those of the vale had great respect for Baernoth; as such, he was expected to hold the position of Elder for as long as he wished.
